attributes.action: give jagermeister out free in pubs/clubs over xmas and new year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel that when in nightclubs jagermeister along with red bull should be given free to all punters over this christmas period and this tradition should continue for years to come. it guarantees a great night out and is one for the whole family to enjoy. so please let this happen and you will see a decrease in drunken anti-social behaviour and instead you will see more love around the uk.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
